headline: Driving Personal Growth: 3M's Wendy Bauer on Navigating Challenges and Advancing in Leadership
summary: NORTHAMPTON, MA / ACCESS Newswire / June 3, 2025 /Originally published on 3M News Center Wendy Bauer, Group President of 3M's Transportation and Electronics Business Group (TEBG), is recognized as one of the 2025 Automotive News 100 Leading Women. ...
